body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Vincent Williams and the customer's name is Natalie Green.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah, and I'm with Easy Solutions, your partner in all things tech support.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah, nice to meet you!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you too! May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John! Can I also get your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you! And could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's two zero three, five six seven, eight nine zero two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, John. Is there anything specific you need help with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm having trouble with my internet connection.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I can assist you with that! Thank you for your time today, John, and I look forward to helping you resolve your issue.
